title: Which institute is best for data science course in Kolkata? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, to directly answer your question, there are a few institutions providing data science courses in Kolkata, but as for me, I think, “Webel Fujisoft Vara Centre of Excellence in industry 4.0” has one of the most advanced course structure. They provide a post-graduate certificate in data science intended for everyone interested in developing skills and experience to pursue a career in data science of machine learning. It is a distinctive program of 300 hours with hands-on learning facilitated by industry experts and in-depth learning modules for analytics. At the end of the course, you will be certified by three very prestigious organizations, “Intel” “Boston Training Academy” and “Nvidia”  The curriculum for this certification course covers the complete life cycle of data science, that includes Programming languages (R and Python)Data managementData visualizationAnalytics foundationAdvanced statisticsData miningData engineeringMachine learningDeep learningOn completion of the course candidates can have a clear idea of how to apply the concepts of machine learning and data learning to industry. They will be able to efficiently perform data analysis using statistical techniques as well as apply analytics in providing business solutions and understand functional aspects of data science.’ The course will also provide a deep of data - data gathering, data exploration, data manipulation, de-mystifying semi-structured / unstructared data, big data framework, cloud architecture etc.

In this digital world, a huge amount of data is generated every day in every field. Collecting and maintaining the data is ineffectual until they are researched or analyzed properly to reveal patterns for helping businesses make wise decisions related to their growth. Data science is a course that provides learning about how to use and manage structured and unstructured data using some basic mathematics and statistical techniques. Companies have a lot of benefits by analyzed data in enhancing the business revenue and developing new business strategies. Whether it is a medical field that needs to store patient’s information, a sports field that collects data on players and their playing styles, a plan about how to solve crowds and traffic problems, or storing astronomical data in the astrophysics field, a data scientist is someone who analyzes data and finds some useful outcomes. Data science is the most demanded course nowadays. Companies want to hire certified data scientists to reveal innovative ideas and strategies to run their businesses successfully. Such companies offer lucrative offers and benefits to attract those expert professionals to join the team. In the 21st century, it will be the most attractive job field with diverse opportunities and scopes. So, many students want to choose this course to shape their careers truly. Take a look at the following points to understand why you want to appear the course: Huge job opportunities Research says, not only this country but the whole world is offering bright career opportunities to the students who have completed the data science course successfully. First-rated enterprises find certified professionals to recruit in different sectors for increasing revenue and sales. After completing the training, job opportunities will knock your door. Freedom in choosing the suitable job field When you are an expert in analytics skills, you are no more bound to a particular field but, you have the freedom to work in any field from manufacturing to finance, from healthcare to entertainment. You are competent to accept any challenge related to a project when you are a proficient data scientist. High-paid salary The report says data science is at the top position among 25 most recognized jobs in the world. Data scientists are valuable with maximum analytics skills and they can possess higher salaries to enjoy the perks. Opportunities to work with tech giants A graduate in data science has an open opportunity to companies like LinkedIn, Apple, Facebook, Google, Amazon, Uber, etc. obtaining a good grade in this course gives you opportunities to work with so-called tech giants in the IT field. Lesser competition than other fields Many professional courses are there in the market but, data science is completely different from others. It has a huge demand in different sectors but, the efficient candidates are a few. So, the competition is less and the approved candidates have great career perks after completing the course. An assortment of associated skills Knowing how to work with data and solving problems enhance other abilities like decision-making skills, leadership skills, management skills, communicative skills, etc. Together these skills make students more eligible to face every challenge in the job field. Availability of courses To become a proficient and certified data scientist many courses are available in the market. Both the online and classroom training is available where proficient mentors offer top-notch training and students have the necessary tools and techniques to become qualified data scientists. I must thanks to Hands-On System at Kolkata for the all round support to become a data scientist. Best place to learn SAS, R and Python.
